A

addComponentsToPane(Container) - Static method in class AStarTest
Create the GamePanel and use a LayoutManager to fill the entire parent container with it.
addMouseListener() - Method in class GridCell
Adds a MouseListener that toggles passability upon left-click and cycles through the special states upon right-click.

A utility class containing static methods for creating the system window and initializing the GamePanel.

R

registerKeybindings() - Method in class GamePanel
Registers the enter key as the "findPath" action, which creates a new Pathfinder object, retrieves the shortest path as a List, and prints the path to the console.
